subtitleNullable: A Beautiful Pokédex: All 898 Pokémon with Statistics, Images & URLs
descriptionNullable:
In this dataset, I have combined data from a few of the popular Pokémon datasets on Kaggle, all into one single file.
I have also added the Bulbapedia and Gameinfo URLs of all the different Pokémon along with their Images and Image URLs from the Bulbapedia Archives.

I have tried to simplify the already-existing Pokémon data to make it more simple, user-friendly and easy-to-understand for all Kaggle users.

Furthermore, I have also added a lot of images to make it look like a beautiful, real-life Pokédex. I have also put additional URLs, so that you can even browse the internet for more information on your favorite Pokémon.

I wish that you all will really like and enjoy using this Pokédex for your data science projects

In your free time also, you'll really enjoy going through this beautiful Pokédex. I can guarantee!

Thank you.
title: The Pokemon Encyclopedia!
